Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +34
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1

Dodge: +1 AC/+1 CMD
Improved Critical (Sickle): x2 Sickle Threat Range
Strength Attack Adjustment: -1
Strength Damage Adjustment: -1
Weapon Finesse: +2 light melee weapon attack (Dexterity instead of Strength)
Weapon Focus (Sap): +1 Sap Attack Modifier
Bleeding Attack: Sneak attack inflicts 4 HP/rd (magic healing or DC 15 Heal ends)
Combat Reflexes: May take AOO while flat-footed and 2 AOO/rd
Crippling Strike: Sneak attack inflicts 2 points Strength damage
Defensive Roll: Successful Reflex (DC damage) vs. lethal blow reduces damage by half
Improved Uncanny Dodge: Cannot be flanked, sneak attack only by rogue level 21+
Mobility: +4 AC vs. movement AOO
Opportunist: May take an AOO targeting a foe struck by an ally
Resiliency: May gain 7 temporary HP for 1 min when below 0 HP 1/dy
Shadow Master: Critical hit blinds for d6 rd in dim light
Shadow Master: DR 10/-
Slow Reactions: Sneak attack target may take no AOO for 1 rd
Sneak Attack: Hit inflicts +4d6 HP when foe is flanked or denied Dexterity bonus
Stand Up: May stand from prone as free action
Surprise Attack: All foes are flat-footed during surprise round
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dexterity modifier to AC (foe feint neg)
Save: Fortitude: +7; Reflex: +11; Will: +10
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +1
Iron Will: +2 Will
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +3
Evasion: Reflex save in light or no armor yields no damage instead of half
Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex in light or no armor save yields half damage
Shadow Master: +2 saves in dim light
Slippery Mind: May attempt second save vs. enchantment in next rd
Trap Sense: +2 Reflex and AC vs. traps

Spell Slots: Rogue0; Rogue1 Spell DC: Rogue: 11
Spells:
Bleed (Rogue0 Necr): R40' Stabilized target suffers 1 HP and resumes dying (DC 11 Will neg)
Dispel Magic (Rogue3 Abju): R170' Successful d20+7 check vs. 11+caster level cancels targeted spell or 1 spell on targeted creature
Magic Missile (Rogue1 Evoc): R170' 4 missiles inflict 1d4+1 HP each in 15' radius
Magic Notes:
Dispelling Attack: Sneak attack acts as Dispel Magic on target
Major Magic: May cast chosen level 1 spell 2/dy
Minor Magic: May cast chosen level 0 spell 3/dy
Shadow Call: May mimic conjuration (creation or summoning) spell up to 6th level (DC 16 Will 20% effect) 4/dy
Shadow Illusion: R800' May create 140' cu image (DC 10 Will disbelieve) for conc 5/dy
Shadow Jump: May teleport between shadows 320'/dy
Shadow Power: May mimic evocation spell up to 4rd level (DC 14 Will 20% effect) 2/dy
Summon Shadow: May summon unturnable Shadow companion with 54 HP, +12 BAB, +7/+11/+10 Fort/Ref/Will, and +4 Will vs. channeled energy
